mil7.4.1:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘pathaviya panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.1:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, pathavi itthanitthani kappuragarutagaracandanakunkumadini akirantepi pittasemhapubbaruhirasedamedakhelasinghanikalasikamuttakarisadini akirantepi tadisayeva;
mil7.4.1:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena itthanitthe labhalabhe yasayase nindapasamsaya sukhadukkhe sabbattha tadinayeva bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.1:1.4: Idam, maharaja, pathaviya pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.1:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pathavi mandanavibhusanapagata sakagandhaparibhavita;
mil7.4.1:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena vibhusanapagatena sakasilagandhaparibhavitena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.1:2.3: Idam, maharaja, pathaviya dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.1:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pathavi nirantara akhandacchidda asusira bahala ghana vitthinna;
mil7.4.1:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena nirantaramakhandacchiddamasusirabahalaghanavitthinnasilena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.1:3.3: Idam, maharaja, pathaviya tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.1:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, pathavi gamanigamanagarajanapadarukkhapabbatanaditalakapokkharanimigapakkhimanujanaranariganam dharentipi akilasu hoti;
mil7.4.1:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ovadantenapi anusasantenapi vinnapentenapi sandassentenapi samadapentenapi samuttejentenapi sampahamsentenapi dhammadesanasu akilasuna bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.1:4.3: Idam, maharaja, pathaviya catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.1:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena anunayappatighavippamuttena pathavisamena cetasa viharitabbam.
mil7.4.1:5.3: Idam, maharaja, pathaviya pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.1:5.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, upasikaya culasubhaddaya sakasamane parikittayamanaya—
